resources.string: select %2$s, count(*) from %1$s where 1 = 1 %3$s group by %2$s
select coalesce(a.initialetitrealbum, s.initialetitreserie), count(a.id_album) from albums a left join series s on a.id_serie = s.id_serie where 1 = 1 %s group by 1

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie where coalesce(a.initialetitrealbum, s.initialetitreserie) %s order by coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution
select c.initialenomcollection, count(c.id_collection) from collections c where 1 = 1 %s group by c.initialenomcollection

select s.id_serie, s.titreserie, s.id_editeur, e.nomediteur, s.id_collection, c.nomcollection from series s left join editeurs e on s.id_editeur = e.id_editeur left join collections c on s.id_collection = c.id_collection where s.initialetitreserie %s order by s.titreserie, e.nomediteur, c.nomcollection
select e.id_editeur, e.nomediteur from editeurs e where e.initialenomediteur %1$s %2$s order by e.nomediteur
select c.id_collection, c.nomcollection, e.id_editeur, e.nomediteur from collections c inner join editeurs e on e.id_editeur = c.id_editeur where c.initialenomcollection %s order by c.nomcollection
select p.id_personne, p.nompersonne from personnes p where p.initialenompersonne %s order by p.nompersonne
select a.anneeparution, count(a.id_album) from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie where 1 = 1 %s group by a.anneeparution

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie where a.anneeparution %s order by coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution

select e.nomediteur, count(a.id_album), e.id_editeur from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join editions ed on ed.id_album = a.id_album left join editeurs e on e.id_editeur = ed.id_editeur where 1 = 1 %s group by e.nomediteur, e.id_editeur

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join editions ed on ed.id_album = a.id_album left join editeurs e on e.id_editeur = ed.id_editeur where e.id_editeur %s order by coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution
select s.titreserie, count(a.id_album), s.id_serie from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie where 1 = 1 %s group by s.titreserie, s.id_serie

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie where s.id_serie %s order by a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution, coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie

select c.nomcollection, count(a.id_album), c.id_collection, case when c.id_collection is not null then e.nomediteur end, case when c.id_collection is not null then e.id_editeur end from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join editions ed on ed.id_album = a.id_album left join collections c on ed.id_collection = c.id_collection left join editeurs e on e.id_editeur = ed.id_editeur where 1 = 1 %s group by c.nomcollection, c.id_collection, 4, 5

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join editions e on a.id_album = e.id_album where e.id_collection %s order by a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution, coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie

select g.genre, count(a.id_album), g.id_genre from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join genreseries gs on gs.id_serie = a.id_serie left join genres g on gs.id_genre = g.id_genre where 1 = 1 %s group by g.genre, g.id_genre

select a.id_album, a.titrealbum, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.moisparution, a.anneeparution, a.notation, a.id_serie, s.titreserie, a.achat from albums a left join series s on s.id_serie = a.id_serie left join genreseries gs on gs.id_serie = a.id_serie left join genres g on gs.id_genre = g.id_genre where g.id_genre %s order by coalesce(a.titrealbum, s.titreserie), s.titreserie, a.horsserie, a.integrale, a.tome, a.tomedebut, a.tomefin, a.anneeparution, a.moisparution
